CustomField.formula:
"By approving this form, you are certifying that: " & br() &
" •the thesis/exegesis complies with the provisions in Graduate Research Examinations Schedule B-Presentation of Theses for Graduate Research Degrees " & br() &
" •for practice-based degrees that the artefact(s) comply with the Guidelines for examinable components of practice-based degrees by research " & br() &
" •in your opinion the examinable works are worthy of a candidate for the degree " & br() &
" •the candidate’s declaration of authorship is correct and complies with the verbatim requirement of Schedule B (Appendix 1, Statement of authorship) " & br() &
" •where there are co-authors outside the supervisory team, you have sighted the written confirmation from the co-author or coordinating author verifying the candidate’s contribution to the work. "
CustomField.label: Supervisor Instruction
